text: khanditavagiyu maryamara putra masihare allahanendu vadisidavaru dhikkarigalagi bittaru. Heliri; ondu vele allahanu maryamara putra isarannu, avara tayiyannu, bhumiyalliruva ellarannu nasa mada bayasidare, avanannu yaru tane tadeyaballaru? Akasagala, bhumiya mattu avugala naduve iruva ellavugala adhikaravu allahanige seride. Avanu tanicchisiddannu srstisuttane. Allahanu ellavannu madalu saktanagiddane
